FuncDef: This command configures the channel service unit (CSU) compatibility mode to interoperate with existing DS-3 subrate standards.

ParaDef.Info: Enables the Digital-Link (Quick Eagle) CSU compatibility mode.
Enables the Larscom CSU compatibility mode.

Specifies the subrate value for the associated DS-3. Values-1 to 147 (digital-link)
1 to 14 (larscom).
